alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas; Moultrie (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 01 at 2:34AM CST until February 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 11 to 14 inches, sleet accumulations of around 1/4 of an inch and ice accumulations of one tenth to one quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Douglas, Moultrie and Christian Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com
